data.actual_result: It's visible the default description of a keybind even on keybinds overwritten
data.expected_result: The red keybind override description should replace the default keybind description
data.short_description: The keybind override alert is not showing under the keybind description
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to User Settings - Go to Keybinds - The keybinds override description is not showing. This bug happen with these keybinds: `CTRL + SHIFT + ALT + UPARROW`, `CTRL + SHIFT + ALT + DOWNARROW`, `CTRL + ALT + RIGHTARROW`, `CTRL + ENTER`, `PAGE UP`, `PAGE DOWN`, `SHIFT + PAGE UP`, `CTRL + NUMPAD /`, `HOME` and `END`
